content.rendered:
What is Maker

Maker is a decentralized autonomous platform that allows anyone to equally share a part of a cryptocurrency on a truly decentralized basis. The MKR cryptocurrency is the governance utility token of the Maker project based on the Ethereum blockchain network. 

Maker Wallet

Manage your crypto wisely! Learn how to setup Atomic Wallet to send, receive, exchange and buy Maker (MKR).
